import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-histogram-diagram', templateUrl: './histogram-diagram.component.html', styleUrls: ['./histogram-diagram.component.scss'] }) export class HistogramDiagramComponent { @Input() frequencyNumber!: number[]; @Input() bloodPressureRange!: number[]; frequency = [0,11,34,40,60,20,88,0,7,0,0]; caculateBarHeight(range:number){ let index = (range - 80) / 10; return { height: `${this.frequency[index] * 0.4}vh` } } getFrequency(range: number) }
